name: OHMD
description: Olympus Doge is building a financial services ecosystem based around its reserve currency token $wsOHMD on Dogechain. Olympus Doge believes in the future of Dogechain and therefore the $wsOHMD token will long term mirror the price of $DOGE. The token gets rebase rewards every 8 hours which benefits holders and the supply increase helps to drive towards the price of $DOGE. The ecosystem has/is building: an auditing service, NFTs, liquidity management bot, bonding as a service, limit order bots, dollar-cost-average bots, and a lending and borrowing platform.
